text: [Men Nulii] kadi faade e Madyana, musiɗɗo maɓɓe on Su'aybu, o maaki : "Ko onon yo yimɓe am, rewee Alla. Reweteeɗo alanaa on ko woori Mo. Gomɗii ɓanngannduyee arii on immorde ka Joomi mon. Timminee etirɗe ɗen e manndikke ɗen, wata on ɗuytan yimɓe ɓen piiji maɓɓe ɗin, wata on bonnu ko leydi ɓaawo moƴƴugol ndi. Ko ɗum mooɗon ɓuri on moƴƴannde si on laatike gomɗimɓe
